casebody.data:
(C.E.G.-Petitioner) C-554 September Term 2017
079864 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 2, 2018 **136To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

In the MATTER OF the CIVIL COMMITMENT OF C.E.G., SVP-452-07.

**137A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004228-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
